recipe_name: Blue cheese bruschetta with apple chutney
author: Paul Rankin
method: Preheat the grill to its highest setting. Place the butter and sugar into a saucepan over a high heat and cook until melted.  Add the apples and cook for five to ten minutes, until caramelised and cooked through. Heat a griddle pan until smoking and cook the slices of bread for one minute on each side. Cover with the blue cheese and place under the grill for 1-2 minutes, or until melted. Spoon over the apples and the sprinkle with the dill to serve.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter,  25g/1oz brown sugar,  1 apple, peeled, cored and cut into six pieces,  4 slices French bread,  110g/4oz blue cheese, cut into four pieces,  1 tsp fresh dill, chopped, to serve
